Text:
I'm liking it about the same as I did Gutter Phenomenon. The vocals are way better, but the song-writing and recording quality are dumbed-down. A 7/10 or 8/10.

The rip would have sounded better if it were Joint Stereo rather than straight Stereo. It sounds close to 128, and not so much like 192.

Loved it!
Download was really fast as well. 

Tyvm mate!
Everytime I Die get better and better. I've been looking for this album for ages now. Thanks for uploading it ;D
